event.name: Whistler Day Trip 29th of June

place.name: Whistler Mountain Resort
place.address: 300 Hastings St W, Vancouver, British Columbia V6B 1K6

event.description:
Day Trip to whistler on the 29th of June with a night out: 40$ cash to Mathieux Barlow-Ladias
Or Revolut to +12369793020  for the transport this weekend

Bus leaving from UBC Fraternity village: 8am

Bus back from whistler: 2am after the night out.



Chill day session by lost lake with a night in the town. We also all have free cover and a free drink in whistler's Garfinkleâs club before 10:30pm.

Let me know if you're coming and I'll stick you and your mates on the bus list. To confirm and secure your space make sure to get the money in 

But get them quick. First come first on the list

data.post:
Last 10 seats left on the bus for this weekend guys. Let me know if your coming. Would be cool to get a village group rather than randomers from the outside for the last seats.

Shoot me a message to let me know. 

https://www.facebook.com/events/1216992155146805/?ti=icl

data.post:
Hello people,

Organizing a big bus up to Whistler for a big day trip on Saturday. A few spaces left. with lots of Irish gals and guys already going All are welcome!!

Leaving at 8am from UBC 

The plan is to chill by lost lake and then go on a night out to the main club Garfinkle's. Free into the club until 10:30 with a free drink and the party bus coming back at 2am after.

Let me know if you are interested. All the best

data.post:
Hello Brothers,
Irish zete here from the Theta Omicron chapter.
coming to Vancouver for the summer with 3 friends from mid May to early/mid August. Would be great to see some of you or whoever is around!  I'd also appreciate any help finding accomadation if you happen to have any tips.  
All The Best,
TKP

activity_log_data.title: Mathew Barlow Ladias posted in Zete Connect.

data.post: Looking for a 4 person apartment from mid May to mid August. Would love to set up a skype call to discuss more. Wish you all the best. Please contact me if you think this is feasible.
